title: Know this handwriting font with a unique lowercase g?
content:
Anyone recognize this font? I have a client that really loves it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100407030923im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fonts_5881.jpg)
author: Alaskan

comments.content:
[Baka Too](http://web.archive.org/web/20100407030923/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/typetrust/baka_too/?&sample_text=Wise%20Is%20the%20New%20Young+&sample_size=48&update=0&update=0)

What's the source of these images?

Thanks! Much appreciated.

The images are from the book "Caffeine for the Creative Team" by Stefan Mumaw and Wendy Lee Oldfield. Cool book, funky designs.
